tab1.text1:
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Join the Discord using the 'join' link below or alternatively via</>
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">discord.gg/hyZPVAVSnn</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Howdy Survivors! Hope you're finding the server good so far!</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">Before diving in, we ask you to take a moment to familiarize yourself with our community rules and conduct. These guidelines are designed to ensure everyone has a positive and enjoyable experience. You can find basic rules on the rules tab, and a more comprehensive set on our Discord.</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">MODS</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">The mods installed have been meticulously chosen and, in certain instances, modified to ensure a balanced experience. We want to enhance the immersiion for our players. We do consider mod suggestions from the community. Please visit the Discord page and visit the 'Help & Suggestions' tab to submit a mod you think would fit in this servers vibe.</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">ONGOING WORK</><RichColor Color="255,255,255,255">We're still relatively new here so please bear with us while we get everything set up. We have a lot of ground to cover and still have many ideas to flesh out and implement - keep an eye on 'Whats New?' for any updates, or announcements on the 'server-changes' channel on Disord.</>

<TextStyle.White><TextStyle.White>White Text</></>
<TextStyle.Black><TextStyle.Black>Black Text</></> < Yes its Black Text on a Black background

You can use the ARKML syntax to colorize the titles, normal text and button texts. ARKML uses RGBA values to define the colors. Here are some examples:

<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1"><RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Red Text</></>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1"><RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Green Text</></>

Please keep in mind that you <TextStyle.Red>NEED TO</> unescape the doublequotes with a backslash!!!</>
